title: New: Teen Ravine – Friend of a Friend
body:
This debut single from Toronto’s **Teen Ravine** (Nick Rose and Dan Griffin) is gloriously 80’s inspired – there’s almost a kinda Glenn Frey vibe to it.

In terms of more modern contemporaries, it feels a little like a cross between The 1975 and Wild Nothing – slightly less pop than the Mancunian outfit, slightly more upbeat than WN. Check out _Friend of a Friend_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
